plot: A model is found dead in the bathtub of her own mansion. A policeman tries to investigate, inquiring the rich and powerful men who knew her.
title: Retrato Falado de uma Mulher Sem Pudor
plot_es: A model is found dead in the bathtub of her own mansion. A policeman tries to investigate, inquiring the rich and powerful men who knew her.
original_name: Retrato Falado de uma Mulher Sem Pudor
plot_en: A model is found dead in the bathtub of her own mansion. A policeman tries to investigate, inquiring the rich and powerful men who knew her.
